body.p: When it developed ED 2, the Board first considered conceptual arguments relating to the recognition of an expense arising from equity‑settled share‑based payment transactions, including arguments advanced by respondents to the Discussion Paper and other commentators. Some respondents who disagreed with the recognition of an expense arising from particular share‑based payment transactions (ie those involving employee share options) did so for practical, rather than conceptual, reasons. The Board considered those practical issues later (see paragraphs BC294–BC310).
